item.description:
Learn the basics of the 9 Enneagram type, your core type, growth and relationship dynamics for each type and particularly your type. Herb acts out the types with hats.

3 to 5:00pm

$40, sliding scale available if needed $40-20 based on ability to pay

Herb has been teaching the Enneagram for 22 years and is a therapist, personal coach, workshop leader, trainer in organizations and author of The Idiot's Guide to the Enneagram and Herb's Tips for Living.

781 648 3737

www.herbpearce.com

herb@herbpearce.com
item.how_to_find_us: Arlington Heights, Corner of Tanager St. and Wollaston Ave.
item.name: Enneagram Personality Types Workshop
